summary: This is an email chain forwarding a request from the DOJ Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) to the FBI's Office of General Counsel for a sensitivity review of OPR's draft report concerning the Southern District of Florida's handling of the Jeffrey Epstein matter during 2006-2008. The draft report is large and sent in parts, with confidentiality requested.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document references the DOJ OPR's draft report concerning the handling of the Jeffrey Epstein matter by the Southern District of Florida during 2006-2008.

events.title: Southern District of Florida's handling of Epstein matter
events.description: The period under review by the DOJ Office of Professional Responsibility regarding how the Southern District of Florida handled the Jeffrey Epstein case.

events.title: OPR transmits draft report for sensitivity review
events.description: The DOJ Office of Professional Responsibility transmits its draft report on the Epstein matter handling to the FBI Office of General Counsel for a sensitivity review.

keyFacts: The DOJ Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) produced a draft report concerning the Southern District of Florida's handling of the Jeffrey Epstein matter during 2006-2008.
OPR requested a sensitivity review of this draft report from the FBI's Office of General Counsel in Washington, D.C.
The draft report was too large to email in one piece and was to be sent in multiple parts.
The correspondence emphasizes that the draft report should be treated with confidentiality.
The email chain shows internal DOJ/FBI coordination regarding the review of the Epstein case handling.
